changeSet.author: chaimaa
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ADDRESS ( ID INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, ADDRESS VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL UNIQUE, CITY VARCHAR(50), ZIP INT );
CREATE TABLE FIRE_STATION ( ID INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, STATION INT NOT NULL, ADDRESS_ID INT, FOREIGN KEY (ADDRESS_ID) REFERENCES ADDRESS(ID) );

CREATE TABLE PERSON ( ID INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, LAST_NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PHONE VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, EMAIL VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, BIRTHDATE DATE NOT NULL, ADDRESS_ID INT, FOREIGN KEY (ADDRESS_ID) REFERENCES ADDRESS(ID) );

CREATE TABLE MEDICAL_RECORD_MEDICATION ( MEDICAL_RECORD_ID INT, MEDICATION_ID INT, FOREIGN KEY (MEDICAL_RECORD_ID) REFERENCES MEDICAL_RECORD(ID), FOREIGN KEY (MEDICATION_ID) REFERENCES MEDICATION(ID) );
CREATE TABLE MEDICAL_RECORD_ALLERGY ( MEDICAL_RECORD_ID INT, ALLERGY_ID INT, FOREIGN KEY (MEDICAL_RECORD_ID) REFERENCES MEDICAL_RECORD(ID), FOREIGN KEY (ALLERGY_ID) REFERENCES ALLERGY(ID) );

changeSet.author: chaimaa
